# comm4190_F25_Tiktok_Task: Public Opinion Analysis on Kayla Nicole vs. Taylor Swift

## Project Overview

This project analyzes public opinion in TikTok comments regarding the debate between Kayla Nicole and Taylor Swift. Using Large Language Model (LLM) coding with GPT-4, we examine how users position themselves in celebrity conflicts and how platform engagement metrics differ based on comment stance.

## Research Question

**How do TikTok users position themselves in the debate between Kayla Nicole and Taylor Swift?**

## Main Findings

- Overwhelming Pro-Kayla and anti-Taylor sentiment 
- Polarized discourse with few nuanced or mixed opinions
- The TikTok video itself supports Kayla's "clap back"
- Users sympathize with Kayla (ex-girlfriend) over Taylor (billionaire)

### Main Files
- `report.md` - Complete report with all sections
